title: Huntington Bancshares CEO: #1 Priority is Organic Growth
description: Stephen Steinour, CEO of Huntington Bank, discusses earnings and growth with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” He says the company’s expansion into North and South Carolina is a major move for the bank. (Source: Bloomberg)
